ComicInfo.Title: The Darkside To Victory
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 14:11:50. [Issue ID 36807]
ComicInfo.Summary:
It's the finale to "The Seeds of Destruction" saga! Aric and Maka will fight to the death-- on the moon! But without the aid of the X-O armor, what chance does Aric have against a killer with blood colder than space? One will fall and one will claim the prize: the seed of Shanhara!
Within the moonbase, Aric goes toe-to-toe with the hulking Spider Champion! The alien anticipates an easy victory, only to find that, even without the Armor, Aric still has the strength to snap his neck! When Solar is unable to find out the Spider Homeworld's location, only one option remains: obliteraiton of the alien moonbase. So, reclaiming the Armor, Aric leaves Solar, who first destroys the base, then vaporizes the Spore!
